channel.title: Map-MODS-to-MASTER on The Grinnell College Digital Library Application Developer's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Map-MODS-to-MASTER on The Grinnell College Digital Library Application Developer's Blog

item.title: Exporting, Editing, & Replacing MODS Datastreams: Technical Details
item.description: Attention: On 21-May-2020 an optional, but recommended, sixth step was added to this workflow in the form of a new Drush command: islandora_mods_post_processing, an addition to my previous work in islandora_mods_via_twig. See my new post, Islandora MODS Post Processing for complete details. A 5-Step Workflow This document is follow-up, with technical details, to Exporting, Editing, & Replacing MODS Datastreams, post 069, in my blog. In case you missed it, the aforementioned post was written specifically for metadata editors working on the 2020 Grinnell College Libraries review of Digital Grinnell MODS metadata.
